subject: Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Colleges and Universities
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers reached a $475,000 settlement agreement with its fired basketball coach, Mike Rice, agreeing to pay him for the remaining two years of his contract.
snippet: Rutgers reached a $475,000 settlement agreement with its fired basketball coach, Mike Rice, agreeing to pay him for the remaining two years of his contract.
